code_snippet:
def __init__(self, max_workers: Optional[int] = None, yield_list: bool = False) -> None:
    super().__init__()
    self._pool = PriorityThreadPoolExecutor(max_workers)
    self._futures = deque()
    self._yield = deque()
    self._exception = None
    self.yield_list = yield_list
